cover_letter.intro_para: I am writing to apply for the electrical engineering position at iRobot that was posted on Northeastern University's co-op search site. I am currently a fourth-year student in electrical engineering, and I am very interested in gaining more experience with robotic systems. Given my previous experience and interest in this field, I think that I would be a good fit for this position.

para_background.experience: At my previous co-op with Corindus Vascular Robotics, I worked in the Research and Development lab on a medical robot that assisted with percutaneous coronary intervention procedures. Using C#, I wrote code for the state machine that controlled the embedded robotic system. I also programmed the robot's display and communication modules with Serious SHIPTide, and I extensively used CANCapture for debugging. To test the functionality of existing code, I also wrote unit tests with NUnit. In addition to writing code, I was involved with software verification testing. This included writing test protocols to meet various system requirements and using those protocols to physically test the robot. I also developed Windows applications to assist with automated reliability testing. Throughout this work, I collaborated closely with other members of the software team to meet our goals. This included participating in daily stand-up meetings to discuss completed tasks, items in progress, and future work.

In addition to my work experience, I have developed many technical and communication skills through my classes and labs at Northeastern. In my Electronics class, I worked with op-amps, diodes, BJTs, and MOSFETS. In my Embedded Design class, I wrote C programs in Linux to run on an embedded processor. I also used Simulink to program a Zedboard's FPGA and control a robotic arm.I wrote technical reports detailing the projects in these classes, and I worked effectively with lab partners.
While taking classes, I also worked in Northeastern's SMILE lab, which focuses on machine learning and computer vision. I collaborated with a team to gather images for a Kinship Recognition project.

closing_statements.compatability: I think that with my strong interpersonal skills and past experience, I would integrate well within iRobot's innovative environment.
closing_statements.next_step: I would be excited to meet with you and discuss the position in more detail soon.
